amendment.description: Amendment requires the Task Force to research addiction trends in communities with high rates of prescription drug abuse and overdoses.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part A of House Report 114-551 to require that the task force research addiction trends in communities with high rates of prescription drug abuse.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kuster amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kuster amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Kuster.
